article_title: Market Dynamics Should Strengthen Perrigo’s OTC Business in 2016
article_text: Quotes you view appear here for quick access.

article_metadata.description: From Yahoo Finance: Perrigo (PRGO) is expected to witness an organic growth of 5%–10% in its consumer over-the-counter product revenues in 2016.
